mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les reports de Sir Gefrey Palmer, chevalier & baronet .. [1619-1629]: Imprime & publie per l'original. Ovesque deux tables, l'un des nosmes des cases, l'auter des principal matters conteinus en yceux
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: England and Wales. Court of King's Bench. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: frontispiece, 2 leaves unsigned, B-Z², Aa-Ll⁴, Aaa-Zzz², Aaaa-Zzzz², 5A-5Z⁴, 6A-6G⁴, 6H². [original]
The frontispiece is an engraved protrait of Palmer by R. White. [original]
Impressions 1678, 1688, 172l, identical, except in date. cf. Soule, Lawyer's ref. manual, 1884. [original]
"A catalogue of books printed for, and sold by Robert Pawlet": [1] p. at end. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain
